Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Floor Francisca Snijders at a golf tournament in Amsterdam. They played a round of golf together and discussed potential business ventures, which led to a strong professional relationship.
Floor Francisca Snijders is a 52 year old Proprietary Trader from Netherlands.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Floor Francisca Snijders is married to Van den Berg. Together they have 3 kids called Yara, Evelien and Carlijn.
Education Background:
Floor completed her secondary education at Pieter Nieuwland College Utrecht in 1992.
Floor graduated from Erasmus University Rotterdam in 1995, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
Floor Francisca Snijders is a 52 year old and comes from Netherlands.
Floor Francisca Snijders began her professional journey as a Junior Trader at Vitol Group in 1997, laying the foundation for future success.
In 2000, she moved to Gunvor Group Ltd. to work as a Senior Trader, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Her tenure as a Trading Desk Manager at Gunvor Group Ltd. from 2001 to 2004 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Her next role was as a Head of Commodities at Vitol Group, where she applied her extensive experience to drive innovation from 2006 to 2007.
Currently, she serves as a Proprietary Trader at Trafigura Beheer B.V., continuing to make meaningful contributions to the industry since 2008.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 1630000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has flat located in Boxtel, worth 910000 EUR.

In 2014, she received an inheritance of 2830000 EUR from her late father, who was a prominent Venture Capitalist, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Floor as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
